verses.verse: And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096> <WG5633>, when <WG3753> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> had finished <WG5055> <WG5656> all <WG3956> these <WG5128> sayings <WG3056>, he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>,

Then <WG5119> assembled together <WG4863> <WG5681> the chief Kohanim <WG749>, and <WG2532> the scribes <WG1122>, and <WG2532> the elders <WG4245> of the people <WG2992>, unto <WG1519> the palace <WG833> of the Kohen HaGodol <WG749>, who <WG3588> was called <WG3004> <WG5746> Kayafa <WG2533>,
And <WG2532> consulted <WG4823> <WG5668> that <WG2443> they might take <WG2902> <WG5661> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> by subtilty <WG1388>, and <WG2532> kill <WG615> <WG5725> him.

But <WG1161> when his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101> saw <WG1492> <WG5631> it, they had indignation <WG23> <WG5656>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, To <WG1519> what purpose <WG5101> is this <WG3778> waste <WG684>?
For <WG1063> this <WG5124> ointment <WG3464> might <WG1410> <WG5711> have been sold <WG4097> <WG5683> for much <WG4183>, and <WG2532> given <WG1325> <WG5683> to the poor <WG4434>.

When <WG1161> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> understood <WG1097> <WG5631> it, he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Why <WG5101> trouble ye <WG2873> <WG3930> <WG5719> the woman <WG1135>? for <WG1063> she hath wrought <WG2038> <WG5662> a good <WG2570> work <WG2041> upon <WG1519> me <WG1691>.
For <WG1063> ye have <WG2192> <WG5719> the poor <WG4434> always <WG3842> with <WG3326> you <WG1438>; but <WG1161> me <WG1691> ye have <WG2192> <WG5719> not <WG3756> always <WG3842>.

For in that <WG1063> she <WG3778> <WG5625> <WG846> hath poured <WG906> <WG5631> this <WG5124> ointment <WG3464> on <WG1909> my <WG3450> body <WG4983>, she did <WG4160> <WG5656> it for <WG4314> my <WG3165> burial <WG1779> <WG5658>.

Then <WG5119> one <WG1520> of the twelve <WG1427>, called <WG3004> <WG5746> Y'hudah <WG2455> of K'riot <WG2469>, went <WG4198> <WG5679> unto <WG4314> the chief Kohanim <WG749>,

And <WG2532> from <WG575> that time <WG5119> he sought <WG2212> <WG5707> opportunity <WG2120> to <WG2443> betray <WG3860> <WG5632> him <WG846>.

Now <WG1161> the first <WG4413> day of the feast of matzah <WG106> the Talmidim <WG3101> came <WG4334> <WG5656> to Yeshuw`a <WG2424>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723> unto him <WG846>, Where <WG4226> wilt thou <WG2309> <WG5719> that we prepare <WG2090> <WG5661> for thee <WG4671> to eat <WG5315> <WG5629> the passover <WG3957>?

And <WG2532> the Talmidim <WG3101> did <WG4160> <WG5656> as <WG5613> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> had appointed <WG4929> <WG5656> them <WG846>; and <WG2532> they made ready <WG2090> <WG5656> the passover <WG3957>.

And <WG2532> as they <WG846> did eat <WG2068> <WG5723>, he said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, that <WG3754> one <WG1520> of <WG1537> you <WG5216> shall betray <WG3860> <WG5692> me <WG3165>.

<WG3303> The Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> goeth <WG5217> <WG5719> as <WG2531> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769> of <WG4012> him <WG846>: but <WG1161> woe <WG3759> unto that <WG1565> man <WG444> by <WG1223> whom <WG3739> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> is betrayed <WG3860> <WG5743>! it had been <WG2258> <WG5713> good <WG2570> for that <WG1565> man <WG846> if <WG1487> he <WG444> had <WG1080> not <WG3756> been born <WG1080> <WG5681>.

Then <WG5119> came they <WG4334> <WG5631>, and laid <WG1911> <WG5627> hands <WG5495> on <WG1909> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>, and <WG2532> took <WG2902> <WG5656> him <WG846>.

In <WG1722> that same <WG1565> hour <WG5610> said <WG2036> <WG5627> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> to the multitudes <WG3793>, Are ye come out <WG1831> <WG5627> as <WG5613> against <WG1909> a thief <WG3027> with <WG3326> swords <WG3162> and <WG2532> staves <WG3586> for to take <WG4815> <WG5629> me <WG3165>?
